AI Description: The r-prettyunits package provides a mechanism to format and print human-readable data units in a pretty and customized manner. It offers functions to convert messy data units (e.g., bytes, seconds) into tidy and readable formats for better presentation and interpretation.
Core Features: Conversion Of Data Units Into Human-Readable Formats, Customizable Formatting Options For Units, Support For A Variety Of Units Such As Bytes, Seconds, Etc.
General Tags: Data Units, Data Formatting, Data Presentation
